dict.acceptation: 短暂地；简单地；简略地；略略；

sent.orig: In are briefly introduced, and scientific objectives of these projects are briefly discussed.
sent.trans: 对我国新近研制的大天线进行了简要介绍，对它的科学目标和天线设计的特点作了概要的分析与探讨。

sent.orig: Otherwise, the calculating method for the main parameters of an electro-hydraulic impulse crusher is briefly introduced.
sent.trans: 此外，对电液压咏冲破碎装置主要参数的计算方法也作了简要介绍。

sent.orig: The two leaders briefly addressed reporters in the Oval Office after their private meeting and lunch.
sent.trans: 在私人会晤和午餐之后，两位领袖在椭圆形办公室简短地向记者发表讲话。

sent.orig: This paper briefly expounds the technological design and smelting process of ZCuZn40Mn3Fel.
sent.trans: 主要论述了锰黄铜熔炼工艺设计及熔炼过程。

sent.orig: The open pressure and time of pressure relief valve are introduced briefly. The examples are presented.
sent.trans: 简要介绍了变压器用压力释放阀的开启压力和时间，并给出了实例。
